title: Smokey and the Bandit 2 (1980) (Burt Reynolds, Sally Field)
description:
SMOKEY AND THE BANDIT 2 - 1980

  Reynolds returns as the legendary Bandit, a hero among the high-speed CB radio community. Washed up and a wreckage of a man after Carrie (Sally Field) leaves him, Bandit is reunited with his old buddy Snowman (Jerry Read) and Carrie in order to transport an elephant from Florida to Texas in three days. The promise of a substantial reward. Anyway, Bandit is tracked every mile of the way by persistent Sheriff Buford T Justice (Jackie Gleason) and his wet-behind-the-ears son (Mike Henry) and this time, he's brought a few family reinforcements...

  Starring: Burt Reynolds, Sally Field, Jackie Gleason, Jerry Reed, Dom DeLuise, Paul Williams.

  Directed by: Hal Needham.

  Quality: Very Good Xvid from DVD.

  Length: 1hr. 36min.

  Language: English.

  Size: 688 x 432
